website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you want a decorative collar for a larger dog; otherwise, consider others on our list.
pros: An attractive collar with a unique design – handmade of double-stitched leather and Mayan fabric
Its hardware is solid and has a rustic look
cons: The fabric has a tendency to fray, especially when worn by very active dogs
It also doesn't come in sizes for small dogs

customer_reviews.title: SUBTLE BUT GORGEOUS COLOR AND DETAIL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar, leather is a little darker than stock.. The leather was folded in on itself to fit in the tiniest packaging and I was worried, but within hours molded around my dog's neck. I have a 72lb Rhodesian Ridgeback mix and I am 2 holes in from the last. I chose this for the bright but not obnoxious color on a tan background. Color stitching is imbedded and safe within the leather border. Just got it last week, do not know how it holds up to getting wet or dirty. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite collar I've ever bought, both in appearance and quality. Feels soft & strong
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. The leather is not quite as warmly toned as in the product images (closer to a neutral brown), but is nonetheless beautifully stitched with a quality look and feel.The collar is thick, supple, and fits very comfortably on my dog's neck. The fabric as vibrant as shown in the listing. The wide cut means that I can leave his collar loose and low on the neck without the risk of it slipping over his ears. This product looks and feels like it will last, and has a wonderful rustic appearance.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I think the person got a bad one in the batch and should replace it
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with the person who said this was thin and cheaply made. It is very soft leather and made very well. The hardware is very heavy and the leather is thick and does stand up to strength with a leash...I think the person got a bad one in the batch and should replace it, these collars are very well made and strong..at least the one I got was. I have it on a 60 lb. Basset hound and she loves it. It looks great and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar! Looks sturdy and hand made but I can't give a review on longevity as I couldn't use it on my small dog. Although the collar is set for a wide range of sizes and it will fit the neck of my dog, it is only after it overlaps. It is way too long for her. I suggest they make more sizes, one size fits most just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not time tested
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a beautiful collar but I'm sorry to say that I'm disappointed with how poorly it seems to be holding up. I have a labradoodle who spends most of his time indoors except during walks and the like, but the collar is already getting quite worn. The 2nd loop ripped off and there are parts of the material that have come through the leather bindings are are fraying. I loved this collar when I first got it but in less than a month, it doesn't seem to be standing up to the text of time.
customer_reviews.author: oni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The little metal parts that came out for the belt buckle is a little long for my puppy I bought her collar slightly bigger so I covered it with a little piece of duct tape so it wouldn't poke anything. Might shave it down a little later also so she could grow into it. The strap also did not hold the end of the dog collar in place and had to take a little piece of black duct tape and tape it down all this is because it's bigger and she's smaller so and she's smaller so I have nothing to do with the maker of this product. I'm love it and I feel sure she will grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve seen this before I bought all those other collars!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful sturdy product. I like how it has multiple loops to hold the collar in place so my puppy can’t pull it off and eat it like she has with her previous collars. Very well made with an artisan rustic appearance. I like this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smallest hole 17.5+ inches
customer_reviews.text: Collar size LARGE. It measures at the smallest hole 17.5+ inches. So sad, because its beautifully made, seems sturdy, and I really wanted it for our new girl. She 45 lbs and neck measures 15 inches.
customer_reviews.author: mama b

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: The fabric started coming un-stitched from the leather and falling out on day 1 with this. My dog is not especially hard on her stuff. The leather is thin, though I guess for a $20 price tag, I wouldn't expect anything thicker. As others have mentioned, the buckle is not the most secure. Love the idea, don't love the execution.
customer_reviews.author: Elephantic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and sturdy leather collar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and sturdy leather collar. Was a little disappointed to find that 2 of the grommets were improperly pressed, they will eventually fall out; thankfully, they are not placed where we would use them.
customer_reviews.author: EBinNC

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar!
customer_reviews.text: This collar is so well made. I can not even tell you how excited I was when it came in the mail. It was so nicely wrapped in a bag with a business card. Smelled of fresh leather and so well made. I have a bully breed and she is rough on stuff and this thing just has held up and still looks so nice on her. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. From previous reviews I thought this was going to come in not being as thick as I wanted. It looks great and fits great on my 7 month old 50+ pound German Shepherd puppy and she has room to grow. Update: my GSD is 2yrs and 3mo old now. We decided to buy her a new collar because the last one was getting some wear and tear on the cloth parts. The collar was still fully functional for its purpose. Love this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Antonie G.

customer_reviews.title: A let down
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the collar I was in love, with the color and that it seemed it would be long lasting. Unfortunately a couple months in and the beautifully colored cloth is heavily frayed and several of the medal pieces around the holes have fallen off. So its disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality collar! Bought this one for our puppy, so it is still a bit big and just barely fits (she is 35lbs right now). We ordered this one after getting the green collar for our other 70lb dog. The green one has held up for a year. Colors are accurate to photos.
customer_reviews.author: The Potters

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!! Not for puppies
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful collar and is made out of nicer leather than any clothing I wear myself. My Energetic lab mix though has done a number on it. The soft materials are good for her sensitive skin but did not hold up very well to her rough play. The leather is ripped in a few places and stretched out over all. This would be a great collar for an older and calmer dog though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Shocked by the great quality for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price! I was pretty surprised at how well this was made and the genuine leather for the cost. Came is a fancy little bag too. Love the color and the design.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, and great for a calm dog. My 7 month old rescue pup is high strung, and yanking on a leash ruined one of the eyelets, allowing the collar to fray. It also randomly unbuckled and fell off my dog while she was playing. Gorgeous collar, but I wish I had known it wasnt very sturdy before it got damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting! Beautiful craft!
customer_reviews.text: This collar has lasted my German Shepard for almost 3 years now!! I am so surprised with how well this product has held up to my fur-baby's rough and tumble lifestyle. It is beautiful and fits comfortably. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Fits my 60 lb dog well (with ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Fits my 60 lb dog well (with about one extra hole to go up in size). Definitely wouldn't fit on my 120 lb Rottie.
customer_reviews.author: Asmodeus

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is a little on the cheap side, but totally worth the money. The only complaint I have is it stained my dog's white neck after a swim in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Our dog is on her second one of these collars. The colors stay bright for years. I recommend checking out their website for a full product listing as they have many wonderful items for sale!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Holt

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing, I get compliments all of the time
customer_reviews.text: looks amazing, I get compliments all of the time. Fits the dog great. My only thing against it is that the leather bands on it to keep the slack tight is also leather and stretches easily when wet so the slack is constantly flopping around. no biggie though.

customer_reviews.title: Hardware very heavy and thick-good if you have a beast of an animal but hard to get dog tags on
customer_reviews.text: VERY thick and it will fit my 7 month old golden retriever on the tightest setting but good luck finding an "o" ring that will get your dog tags on that very thick ring. I wouldn't suggest this dog collar even though it's nice thick leather and pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: jamielovesbob

customer_reviews.title: Runs/fits smaller than shown
customer_reviews.text: Bought for large yellow Lab. Did not fit. Dimension shown do not jive when trying to buckle it. Refunded 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Boos

customer_reviews.title: The collar looks really nice, but was waaaay to big for my dog
customer_reviews.text: The collar looks really nice, but was waaaay to big for my dog. I could not find a smaller size. The description did say medium to large dogs so I cannot give a bad review for that. My dog is 25 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wagner

customer_reviews.title: but looks great and is holding up well other than looking thinner ...
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of walking my pitbull and with a rubber band Kong leash that doesn't pull that hard, (hints the rubber band part) the collar is already very scratched at,the material wasn't as thick and string as I expected..but looks great and is holding up well other than looking thinner now because of the stretching..
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality collar!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this for my Labrador Retriever, Geoffrey and I love the colors on this collar! He's about 50 pounds (on the smaller side for his breed) and I had to use the very last hole to make sure it was secure on this neck. It is definitely a high quality collar and would highly recommend if you're looking for something a little different for your pup! I love that the packaging comes with the company's message and the name of the person who made it. (Thank you Rafael!)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Collar for my 80 lb Rottweiler mix. It holds her on the leash even when she tugs. Like all things leather, came a little rough, but its great now that it is broken in. Already bought an extra just in case she ever manages to destroy this one. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It stretches when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.text: When it got wet is stretched, every time... Eventually it got so big, I was going to have to punch more holes in it...
customer_reviews.author: A Bear who sits in the woods!

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this collar
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this collar. My pup looks SO adorable in it. If dogs could be fashionable, my pup would definitely be a little fashionista in this collar. She's a black lab and her black fur really makes the colors pop. :)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar for a special animal
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and I am super excited to put it on my dog! It's beautiful and smells so good! Love how it was packaged!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rustic leather collar! My black lab looks so pretty in this collar! I hope it lasts a long time!!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: A nice pretty collar, the hardware could be stronger but all and all it has lasted and looks really nice on my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this, and it looks great- lovely quality overall
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this, and it looks great- lovely quality overall. But on of the straps that holds the end of the collar on broke after a week and now it just flaps around. Dog seems to not mind though!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Brooke

customer_reviews.title: The strap does not stay where it should, so ...
customer_reviews.text: The strap does not stay where it should, so it loops around. The metal part for each hole is missing for some of them. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Great Dane. Although people think she's a boy this collar has help up very well. It does stretch but the price is amazing for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: ... back - now - don't trust the strength - like the
customer_reviews.text: Little weak retaining my pup - she has broken the clasp - I can bend it back - now - don't trust the strength - like the design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar; sturdy leather
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar; sturdy leather, looks very well made. Gets lots of compliments on it. Hoping this is a collar she can wear for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This collar held up really well for a long time on my very active and rambunctious dog.
customer_reviews.author: ArielE

customer_reviews.title: Looks super, very soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Buttery-soft leather with a really beautiful pattern, the photo doe not do it justice. Looks great, I don't know how long it will last but for the price I would buy one every year.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. The detail is very legit. We have been to Guatemala and it is exactly from the customs. It is strong and the colors are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, a little large and bulky for our 45lb English Setter
customer_reviews.author: Mastercard

customer_reviews.title: It seems very sturdy and the colors are stunning
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous collar. It seems very sturdy and the colors are stunning. We got it for our 7 month old puppy. She is 50 lbs and it fit nicely with plenty room to grow. Pictures do not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bivin

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This collar is awesome, my dog rocks it. Super happy that she looks superfly wearing this product. A huge plus the leather work is really nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: criscris

customer_reviews.title: I loved the way this collar looked
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way this collar looked, however the bands that hold the collar in place came off within the first 2 weeks. I would not recommend this for an active dog!
customer_reviews.author: Baley Smith

customer_reviews.title: This collar looks so nice and handsome on our pup
customer_reviews.text: This collar looks so nice and handsome on our pup. The main problem is it's falling apart after only a month. The metal rings for most of the holes have fallen out and then the fabric starts to fray. Am torn about whether to replace it or not, because I really do love how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gamble

customer_reviews.title: collar beautiful, just not
customer_reviews.text: stretched out and came off my pup after 3 days, collar beautiful,just not functional
customer_reviews.author: James Harris

customer_reviews.title: Decorative use only
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful collar, I was excited to get it. I learned quickly that there was no way to use it for leash walks. My dog tugged and it slipped right off her neck. I'm disappointed in this product but you get what you pay for. It's pretty, but that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Collar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar. Just as pictured. Looks so pretty on my puppy. Also, I love that the large number of holes makes it super adjustable. It could fit dogs much larger or smaller than she is. If anything ever happens to this one, I'll likely get another. 💖
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Big and solid, lots of room for her to grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: marsupial3

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is way off... I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is way off...I had to returned because according to this people my dog was a medium...well i think i need an extra small . And yes I know how to use a tape measure
customer_reviews.author: LHLE

customer_reviews.title: very good quality leather
customer_reviews.text: very good quality leather, the other puppy has even been chewing on it sometimes and I don't see any damage. Wish the colors were more vibrant, but overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LPG317

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and very sturdy. Only cost a fraction of what a crappier collar at pet smart would cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Mirkovich

customer_reviews.title: Broken after light use
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this collar but it broke within a few months, very grateful it didn't break while we were on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but disappointing....
customer_reviews.text: Good looking collar but one dip in the pond immediately ruined the coloring of the leather. Once it dried off, the leather part is basically white now. Pretty disappointed, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I am returning it
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong collar. I ordered the tropical blue and got a plain leather collar. Very disappointed. I am returning it. I really wanted one for my jack Russell whose neck is 14.5 inches but the medium regular leather was huge, so 2 sad points. Appears to be quite sturdy and heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Panchita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful work! I definitely will buy this again in the future, either for my own pup in a different color or as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar, very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful collar, and extremely well made. My only complaint is that the holes for the buckle were marked, but impenetrable. After taking a hammer and a nail to them, which made them slightly bigger, there were no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: very cute but the fabric is totally frayed after only 2 months of use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Clasp on a Great Looking Collar
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, but the clasp needs to be changed. We have had this collar for just over 2 months now and our female Boxer popped it off for the third time today. Thankfully she sticks around when she breaks free. Will be looking for a new collar now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique collar for the unique pooch!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautifully made, easy to use collar. Everyone who sees it comments on how cool it is!
customer_reviews.author: KYates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The collars are beautiful and well made. My only problem, our puppy chewed through it....
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lichliter

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar - Rivet fell out
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar for our dog. The colors are awesome, leather is so soft, buckle and Loop are sturdy. Sadly one of the rivets fell out within 3 days of purchase. Hide & Drink please let me know if there's anything you can do to fix this! I don't want to get rid of this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable leather collar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Weimaraner. Leather is nice, soft, and comfortable for her. The color is perfect and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and looks beautiful on my blue heeler !
customer_reviews.author: debra avery

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality. eyelets that I wasn't even using fell ...
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality. eyelets that I wasn't even using fell out within a month. very good looking collar but horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors. The sizing in inches that they give ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous colors. The sizing in inches that they give you is not accurate. It fit my 65 lb dog with a 20 inch neck with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Block

customer_reviews.title: looks great, didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I have a blue heeler puppy and the collar looked and fit great but I couldn't get the second strap to hold the extra collar length securely. On day 2, the second strap broke. We now have a zip tie to hold it in place till I can run to the pet store tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Juarez

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but it is not really for medium dogs
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but it is not really for medium dogs, more for large dogs, it's too big for my 35 pound dog, I'd include the diameter in your description. The craftsmanship is pretty awesome though. Kudos to the designer. Sadly I may need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: i silva

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, perfect size for my Labrador and colour looks great on my yellow Labrador too. However colour Is darker than the first few photos. The last photo is the most accurate colour representation of the collar. Also fantastic that they ship internationally!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this collar made very well the quality is great the cost was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: alfred rafanello

customer_reviews.title: My dog is about 40-45lbs and it fit perfect! It was beauitful on her but unfortunently after ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is about 40-45lbs and it fit perfect! It was beauitful on her but unfortunently after a little over a month... it was falling apart! I'm very sad. I'd give it 5 stars if it were more durable
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for the puppy to get big enough to wear, but love the quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Healeyboy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Small leather strap that holds the excess material is flimsy and broke within days.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Del Monte

customer_reviews.title: Way too large and heavy. Poorly made. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too large and heavy. Poorly made. The buckle fell apart when I tried to put the collar on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice leather collar with bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar. I received the wrong size and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar. I received the wrong size and have since received a refund. I would have ordered it again or exchanged for the correct size, but I found a similar collar locally so I did not want to wait for this one to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely fell in love with this collar. Such a cool pattern!! I finally got over my obsession with buying cheap collars here and there and it just wasn't becoming worth it. They'd fall apart or start wearing down and getting super dirty. I was replacing my dog's collar every couple of months. I finally decided to try this one out and I'm glad I did!! It's very durable and super cute. I have an American Bulldog mix, so it fits so well. Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: heyyonay

customer_reviews.title: Cute !
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and decent quality for price - just too big for my dog but nice !
customer_reviews.author: Amber Price

customer_reviews.title: I loved the look and make of this collar but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and make of this collar but the latch kept slipping and it would come off!
customer_reviews.author: crystal l skille

customer_reviews.title: The second strap that holds the strap in place broke ...
customer_reviews.text: The second strap that holds the strap in place broke off in less than a month. And I can't return it! The first strap holder is fixed so you can't slide it over to tuck in the lose strap end that broke off.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar!! but buckle rod the one that goes into the hole to retain the strap doesn't stay in

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a lovely collar but the rivets at the wholes fall out and the thread frays-update, this collar didn't hold up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ference

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful collar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful handmade collar. I did not expect such quality and craftsmanship. My Gemma looks amazing in it. Thank you very much. Josie made my collar.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality leather collar for our visla dog. The coloring fits nicely,robust build. In use couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice well made leash. For reference, a little too big for a 62 lb Australian Shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Hamoush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar, has been holding up for a few months now great!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Fits my 65 pound dog well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Fits my 65 pound dog well. Room to spare, would easily fit an 80 lb dog. But fits my pup wonderfully too!
customer_reviews.author: spearsy23

customer_reviews.title: Predominately black.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the bright colors. Instead of the predominate blue in the picture, it has black. Also, the strip of color is slightly narrower than shown. I was looking forward to the gypsy look. I'm not bothering to send it back, nor am I motivated to try it on my dog. It's big enough for my 100lb. GSD. The leather is well sewn and appears to be of good quality. It's cheaper on amazon.com than the manufacturer's web page.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product great leather smell great quality and looks great on my blue heeler fit perfectly. No problems yet
customer_reviews.author: Justin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I measured my dogs neck and the middle hole on this collar should have been perfect. Even on the tightest hole
customer_reviews.text: The collar was too big. I measured my dogs neck and the middle hole on this collar should have been perfect. Even on the tightest hole, it was tot big. the hardware was bulky and the tongue on the buckle would have poked my other dog in the eye if they tried to play. I loved the look, but the quality and for fell short.
customer_reviews.author: Cissyvb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar but no holes and the picture shows holes. My dog cant even use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Devriendt

customer_reviews.title: This collar is super cute! It's a little big on my 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: This collar is super cute! It's a little big on my 50 lb standard poodles neck but she has a skinny neck. I wouldn't suggest it for dogs much smaller than that unless they have beefy necks. It looks great and seems pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: poodledog18

product_meta.title: Hide & Drink Rustic Mayan Dog Collar Handmade Tropical Blue
product_meta.description:
This Rustic Mayan Dog Collar is the best way to give your best friend a gift of a lifetime, and make them the coolest canine around town. The Dog Collar is perfect for medium to large sized dogs (collar length range of 10” to 19”), and as your dog ages with grace, so will the collar's appearance. Hide & Drink’s Típico Textile embraces a rich and beautiful history, the extremely fashionable Típico Mayan Textile is handwoven on Back-looms, an ancient, traditional weaving technique used over centuries in Centro America, ensuring the highest quality around.

All Hide & Drink leather products are handmade from rustic, durable, Full Grain Leather. Our Full Grain Leather comes from the top layer of the hide, and has all the natural full grain characteristics of the hide...hence the name. It's the best leather you can buy and the only leather that we use.

The flesh side of the soft leather is first stained with natural drab tone and finished with our proprietary beeswax conditioner. Our unique treatment helps the leather to retain its shape without the aid of synthetic stabilizers, offering a natural and durable look.

Product Features


 * The Collar is handmade with high quality Full Grain Leather and beautiful and history rich Mayan Típico Textile
   
   
 *  Perfect for Medium to Large sized dogs (Collar length range 10 – 19 inches)
   
   
 * Heavy Duty Metal D-Ring for ID tag

Hide & Drink is a vertically integrated community-driven brand dedicated to support the local community in La Antigua, Guatemala. Our product is designed, sourced, and manufactured by local artisans for the benefit of local residents. Our wages are fair and we emphasize for-profit development through entrepreneurial education. In addition to creating jobs through the manufacturing and sale of our products, we contribute 5% of our Gross Profits to outstanding non-profit organizations in Guatemala.
feature_bullets: STYLE UP YOUR PUP WITH A HANDMADE TÍPICO COLLAR: This Rustic Mayan Dog Collar is the only way to give your pooch some style and turn heads during walks in the park. Handmade with Mayan Típico Backstrap Loom Textiles native to the land of Central America, this collar contains rich history and limitless beauty. Combined with the extremely durable and sturdy Full Grain Leather, this collar is a perfect way to reflect your dog’s personality.

DURABLE DESIGN; DOUBLE-STITCHED, DOUBLE-LAYERED: This collar will stand the test of time (multiplied by 7 for doggy years), withstanding even the most collar-hating-dogs who love to try to take them off. Double stitched and double layered to ensure durability and long life, this is a collar worthy of your pup.

RUSTIC METAL HARDWARE: We use only the highest quality of heavy duty, durable and long-lasting Brass Metal that will withstand any weather, come rain or shine, mud or river water. Together with the Full Grain Leather, this collar’s appearance will improve over time and usage.

FITS MEDIUM TO LARGE SIZED DOGS: This beautifully handcrafted Mayan Típico Textile Collar is perfect for medium to large sized dogs, with a collar length range of 10 to 19 inches. The collar is crafted with a Heavy Duty Metal D-ring for attaching your dog’s identity tag.

MAKES A FUN & GREAT GIFT: Looking for a gift for your dog this Christmas? Thinking of celebrating your four-legged friend’s birthday? Or even wanting to shower him or her with gifts for National Dog Day? This is the perfect gift for your faithful canine to make him or her the most stylish looking pup around!
